00063   void processOptions(UserServer userServer, const UMS_Data::ListOptOptions_ptr& options, std::string& sqlRequest)
00064   {
00065       std::string sqlListofOptionValues = "SELECT description, value, userid from optionu, optionvalue, users"
00066                                      " where optionu.numoptionid=optionvalue.optionu_numoptionid and"
00067                                      " optionvalue.users_numuserid=users.numuserid";
00068 
00069      size_t userIdSize = options->getUserId().size();
00070      size_t nameSize = options->getOptionName().size();
00071      bool listAllDefault = options->isListAllDeftValue();
00072 
00073      if ((!userServer.isAdmin()) && (userIdSize!=0)) {
00074         UMSVishnuException e (ERRCODE_NO_ADMIN);
00075         throw e;
00076      }
00077 
00078      if(!listAllDefault) {
00079 
00080        if(userIdSize==0) {
00081           sqlRequest = sqlListofOptionValues;
00082           addOptionRequest("userid", userServer.getData().getUserId(), sqlRequest);
00083        } else {
00084           //To check if the user id is correct
00085           checkUserId(options->getUserId());
00086 
00087           sqlRequest = sqlListofOptionValues;
00088           addOptionRequest("userid", options->getUserId(), sqlRequest);
00089        }
00090 
00091        if(nameSize!=0) {
00092           //To check if the option name is correct
00093           checkOptionName(options->getOptionName());
00094 
00095           addOptionRequest("description", options->getOptionName(), sqlRequest);
00096        }
00097     }
00098 
00099   }

00107   UMS_Data::ListOptionsValues* list() {
00108     DatabaseResult *ListofOptions;
00109     std::string sqlListofOptions = "SELECT description, defaultvalue from optionu";
00110 
00111     std::vector<std::string>::iterator ii;
00112     std::vector<std::string> results;
00113     UMS_Data::UMS_DataFactory_ptr ecoreFactory = UMS_Data::UMS_DataFactory::_instance();
00114     mlistObject = ecoreFactory->createListOptionsValues();
00115 
00116 
00117         //Creation of the object user
00118         UserServer userServer = UserServer(msessionServer);
00119         userServer.init();
00120       //if the user exists
00121       if (userServer.exist()) {
00122         //To process options
00123         processOptions(userServer, mparameters, sqlListofOptions);
00124 
00125         //To get the list of options values from the database
00126         ListofOptions = mdatabaseVishnu->getResult(sqlListofOptions.c_str());
00127         if (ListofOptions->getNbTuples() != 0){
00128           for (size_t i = 0; i < ListofOptions->getNbTuples(); ++i) {
00129             results.clear();
00130             results = ListofOptions->get(i);
00131             ii = results.begin();
00132 
00133             UMS_Data::OptionValue_ptr optionValue = ecoreFactory->createOptionValue();;
00134             optionValue->setOptionName(*ii);
00135             optionValue->setValue(*(++ii));
00136             mlistObject->getOptionValues().push_back(optionValue);
00137         }
00138       }
00139     }
00140     else {
00141         UMSVishnuException e (ERRCODE_UNKNOWN_USER);
00142         throw e;
00143     }
00144   return mlistObject;
00145   }
